page.title: 16ECOLOGY: BLEAK DOWN TIP
page.content: The tip is owned by Vectis Stone Ltd. and has been managed by its subsidiary Co., Cheek Plant and Transport Ltd., since 1972. The extent of the dump is 66 acres. The owners had to put in a new road to the tip , build a hut for the tip operator and put in a wheel wash for the lorry. This private tip is open all day: Monday-Friday 0730-1730 and Saturday 0800-1200. It is funny that the manager's name is Mr. Scattergood! You are not allowed to dump poisonous substances or drugs because of dangers to the rivers. Rubbish is buried immediately. The only pests are snakes, as rats are kept away by wild cats. The tip will last for 15 years.
